sentences.english: The cardboard box is provided with a plurality of hatches and a rift. The rift is connected with the hatch.
sentences.chinese: 纸箱具有多个开口和一隙缝，该隙缝连接开口。

sentences.english: The cardboard box is provided with a plurality of hatches and a rift. The rift is connected with the hatch.
sentences.chinese: 纸箱具有多个开口和一隙缝，该隙缝连接开口。

sentences.english: The rifts at both installation holes of the silicon carbide rod ends shall be blocked by asbest rope.
sentences.chinese: 硅碳棒两端安装孔处的隙缝应用石棉绳堵塞。

sentences.english: Through the leaves of every trial there are chinks of light to shine through.
sentences.chinese: 试炼虽然围困我们，仍有许多隙缝可以透光进来的。

sentences.english: The armor plate of his car was split open.
sentences.chinese: 他的汽车的钢板被撞开了一道隙缝。

sentences.english: Their performances are better than that of slot entry hybrid bearing.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，该轴承性能优于传统的隙缝式轴随承。

sentences.english: Through a crack in the rubble, they could see the light fading.
sentences.chinese: 透过瓦砾的隙缝，他们可以看到渐渐暗下去的光线。

sentences.english: Likewise seal around gaps where pipes and wires enter the attic from the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 使用喷涂成型的泡沫来密封你看到光线进入的隙缝。

definition: crack/gap between two objects/gap in time between two events
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
variant of 斑駁|斑驳[ban1 bo2]
to transmit/transmission (of radiation through a medium)/passage
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
